games.title: Find the Frog - Hidden Objects
games.description:
Find the Frog - Hidden Objects

Explore thematic worlds: from cozy farms and mysterious swamps to bustling cities, enchanted forests, sunny beaches, pirate islands, and beyond!

Each world contains 3 levels with unique frogs to discover.

Collect all the frogs to complete your album - they're so adorable you'll want to find every single one!

‚ú® Game Features:

‚úÖ Relaxing gameplay - perfect for stress relief
‚úÖ Simple controls - suitable for all ages
‚úÖ Striking visuals - black-and-white backgrounds with colorful frogs
‚úÖ Frog collection - motivation to complete all levels
‚úÖ Varied difficulty - from beginner to expert challenges

Perfect for evening relaxation.

"Find the Frog" isn't just a game - it's a meditative journey into a hidden object world that will bring you hours of enjoyment.

üê∏ Find them all, Ribbit!
games.howToPlayText:
Search for hidden frogs across beautifully drawn black-and-white scenes! Simply tap them with your finger (on mobile) or click with your mouse (on PC) to reveal their vibrant colors. Find all frogs to complete each level, and finish entire worlds to add special location-themed frogs to your personal collection!

Stuck? Use our handy Magnifying Glass power-up! When those green tricksters hide too well, this helpful tool will reveal where they're lurking.

Good luck and happy hunting - Ribbit!

games.title: Italian Brainrot: Animals Merge Puzzle
games.description:
Italian Brainrot: Animals Merge Puzzle  ‚Äì The Ultimate Meme Creature Merge Game!

Get ready for a hilarious and addictive puzzle experience with Italian Brainrot: Animals Merge Puzzle  ‚Äì the most meme-packed merge game online! Inspired by the viral fruit drop trend, this game features iconic meme creatures like Bombardiro Crocodilo, Capuccino Assasino, and many more internet favorites.

How to play? Simply merge two small meme creatures to evolve into bigger and funnier ones. Keep combining until you unlock the final giant mystery creature ‚Äì can you guess what it is?

Italian Brainrot: Animals Merge Puzzle  isn‚Äôt just fun ‚Äì it‚Äôs eye-popping and wildly entertaining. With vibrant graphics, smooth animations, and trendy meme aesthetics, it's the perfect game for fans of brainrot humor, casual puzzles, and internet culture.

üîπ Free to play online ‚Äì no download required
üîπ Playable on any device
üîπ New meme creatures added regularly
üîπ Perfect for quick sessions or meme marathons

Start merging now and discover what meme madness awaits in Italian Brainrot: Animals Merge Puzzle!
games.howToPlayText:
HOW TO PLAY:

SLIDE / SWIPE on the screen or with mouse and tap to throw funny Italian characters to merge them.

games.title: Squishy Sheep
games.description:
Your mission is to help an adorable cat friend collect every balloon in each level. All it takes is removing the right platform at just the right moment and letting physics do the magic.

Every level is carefully designed to be solved with just a few clicks, while the sheep bounces across ledges and gathers balloons in delightful, unexpected ways. With fluid animations and a cute, inviting art style, Squishy Sheep keeps you coming back for more until every level is complete.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap (on touchscreen) or click with the left mouse button to remove a platform / obstacle.
Timing is key remove platforms at just the right moment so physics does the rest.
The goal in each level is to help your sheep collect all the balloons by bouncing off ledges and using gravity.

games.title: Brainrot Mixup
games.description:
Brainrot Puzzle takes the viral brainrot animal aesthetic and turns it into an actually playable, satisfying, and replayable puzzle game ‚Äî perfect for mobile, casual web, or PC.

If you love quirky puzzle games, if you‚Äôve laughed at ‚Äúbanana chimpanzee‚Äù memes, or if you just want to rot your brain a little in between serious games ‚Äî this one‚Äôs for you.
games.howToPlayText:
In Brainrot Puzzle, your goal is to merge absurd animal ingredients into fully fused brainrot creatures. The game starts with a grid filled with random ingredient tiles like bananas, monkeys, cars, teapots, and more. 

by touch and drag or click and drag the image tiles and sort them in the right order to solve the puzzle.

games.title: Hedgies
games.description: A single Hedgehog is capable of turning a desolate and abandoned household on plot of land into a bustling and flourishing farm. Only a few of us, people, are aware of the fact that Hedgies are great cooks, fishermen, craftsmen and last, but not the least, fabulously hospitable types! Come and see for yourself, plunge into ‚ÄòHedgies‚Äô game and contribute to the beautification of the Valley.
games.howToPlayText: Hedgies is a charming farming game where a hardworking hedgehog transforms an abandoned plot into a thriving homestead. Grow crops, craft goods, and master skills like cooking and fishing. With a warm and welcoming spirit, your hedgehog will turn the valley into a lively community. Step in and help bring this enchanting world to life!

games.title: Match Story : Animals
games.description: Match Story Animals is a fun and addictive 3D puzzle game where players must match cute animal objects to clear the board. With smooth gameplay, colorful graphics, and hundreds of levels, it offers hours of entertainment for puzzle lovers. Use power-ups, boosters, and smart strategies to progress through challenging stages. Perfect for casual gamers of all ages!
games.howToPlayText:
üîç Find and select three identical animal objects
üß© Place them together to make a match
‚ö° Use power-ups to clear tiles faster
‚è± Complete the level before time runs out
üèÜ Progress through levels, earn rewards, and unlock new challenges

games.title: 99 Nights In The Forest - Survival Simulator
games.description:
99 Nights In The Forest - Survival Simulator - Go on outings, get food and resources, fight monsters and find the missing children!

What is in the game:

3 locations filled with both peaceful creatures and hostile ones! And also chests and resources!

The ability to save children by destroying secret bosses!

The skin merchant's store, where you can buy various upgrades!

The ability to earn achievements. For each achievement, you will receive DIAMONDS.
games.howToPlayText:
Click on "Hike" and select a location.
Attack - click when the "triangle" is over the center of the attack bar.
Defense - hold to stop the heart, release to move it in the other direction.

games.title: Hero Sheep
games.description:
Hero Sheep - Pull the Pin & Rescue Game

üêë Play Hero Sheep, a fun and easy pin puzzle game where you help the sheep escape danger! Use your brain to pull the right pin and save the sheep from wild animals, fire, water, and traps.

üß† This is the best rescue game to test your mind. Every level has a new puzzle. Just think smart and pull the pin in the correct order to win!
games.howToPlayText:
- Tap the screen to pull the pin
- Make the right moves to help the sheep escape
- Use water or lava to kill the monsters
- If you pull the wrong pin, the sheep may lose!

games.title: Animal Blocks
games.description: Animal Blocks is a delightful fusion of block puzzle mechanics and charming animal-themed visuals. Crafted for casual fun, this game offers a colorful and relaxing experience perfect for quick play sessions or winding down.
games.howToPlayText:
- Match 3 or more animals to get points, when matching consecutive combinations, the points will be multiplied many times

- Animal theme: The blocks have cute animal designs, adding visual appeal to the classic block puzzle genre.

- Scoring and progression: Players earn points when matching 3 or more blocks, and the higher the score, the more difficult it is

games.title: Eating Simulator The Italian Animals Brainrot
games.description:
Eating Simulator The Italian Animals Brainrot A fun physics puzzle game: feed hungry animals from Italian memes by using gravity, logic, and creativity!

Is a one-of-a-kind physics puzzle game where your mission is to feed adorable and funny animals inspired by Italian memes. Each level challenges your logic, reflexes, and creativity: manipulate objects, control gravity, and build action chains to deliver food straight into the paws or beaks of quirky creatures. The game offers dozens of levels with increasing difficulty, hilarious scenarios, surprising solutions, and signature humor. Attention to detail and precision will be the key to success, while your reward will be the grateful looks of happy, well-fed animals. Dive into a world of carefree fun, where physics is your main tool for playful experiments, and every completed level brings fresh emotions. Test your skills and prove that you can feed every Brainrot animal!
games.howToPlayText: Drag, tap, and build paths! Use blocks and physics to guide food to the animals. Watch out for traps, experiment, and find creative solutions. The goal is simple: make the creatures happy!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/eating-simulator-italian-animal-brainrot?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: The Mad Cow
games.description: One day Dasha the cow went crazy and ran away from home. She ran into the city and started destroying everything. The cow's task is to destroy everything. Destroy buildings with horns and weapons, get points, fly a helicopter, drive a car. Remember, the police will be chasing you.
games.howToPlayText:
PC:
Move - the WASD buttons,
Jump - space bar, 
Attack with horns - button F, 
Shoot weapons - button F, 
Accelerate - shift button,
Pick up an object - T button. 
The mobile control has a joystick + pop-up buttons.

games.title: Sheep Sort
games.description:
Welcome to Sheep Sort Color Match Puzzle Game! 
This is the best Color Puzzle Game where you sort sheep, match colors, and have lots of fun! Sheep Sort Color Match Puzzle Game is easy, relaxing, and full of cute sheep. Enjoy sorting sheep in this amazing Color Puzzle Game!
games.howToPlayText:
- Your job is to sort sheep.
- Tap the sheep and match them by color.
- Sort and match sheep correctly to win each puzzle.
- Complete each puzzle level to move to the next exciting puzzle.
- Puzzles get harder, but sorting and matching sheep becomes more fun!
- Use boosts to sort sheep faster and solve tough puzzles.

games.title: Crazy Sheep
games.description: Crazy Sheep is a fun puzzle-platformer where you help a clumsy sheep overcome obstacles by building a bridge with different items. Available for free online, it features engaging physics challenges. Playable on any device, it's perfect for those who love light-hearted, casual games.
games.howToPlayText:
Help the sheep get to the other side.
To do this, you need to build a bridge from objects.
This is very difficult to do, you need to have a quick reaction and a lot of patience.
In addition, the sheep is very clumsy, and any unevenness in the bridge will prevent it from passing across it.

games.title: Fluffy Mania
games.description:
In this game, your objective is to form chains on fluffy animals on the screen. 
The longer you can maintain the chain, the more points you will earn. 
Putting a cute twist on the traditional matching genre, Fluffy Mania is the best game to relax and kill time with.
games.howToPlayText:
Click and drag to form chains on fluffy animals with the same color. 
The longer the chain, the more points you earn.

games.title: Animal Royal
games.description:
"The ultimate player versus player game allows players to engage in battles against their opponents using unique animals."
You'll be challenged to use your wits and strategy to outsmart your opponents and emerge victorious.
Animal Royal is a game that features a wide variety of animals and birds, each with its unique strengths and weaknesses.
Your goal is to protect your meat from being eaten by your opponent's animals while sending your animals to eat as much meat as possible to win the battle.
- Unique animal and bird with different abilities and strengths
- Engaging and colorful graphics with intuitive controls
- Intense player vs player battles on a battlefield
- You can merge two animals to level up and create a more powerful animal card
- Win the battle and collect more cups
- Compete for glory and rewards!
- Daily challenges and rewards for players

Animal Battle Royale is an exciting game that offers a new twist on the popular player-versus-player genre.
So if you're ready to take on the ultimate animal battle and emerge as the king of the jungle, join the Animal Royal game today!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag and drop with a mouse is when you:

Move the cursor over an item.

Press and hold the left mouse button (don‚Äôt release yet).

Move the mouse to drag the item to a new position.

Release the button to drop it in place.

games.description: Have you ever taken care your pet!? Feed it, clean it, play with it and watch it grow up while leveling up? This is all possible is this brand new Pow game for web and mobile. Feed, nurture and take care of your Pow. Play different games in games room and collect coins to buy food to feed your pow and buy decoration to customize your room! Also challenge your friends in 3 fun minigames!

Use the mouse or touch the screen to interact with Pow and the objects. Follow the instructions on the screen.
You can see the needs progression of the Pow in the vertical bars at the top of the screen for each room. Try to keep the bars full attending the needs in each room.

games.title: Balls Animal
games.description: Balls Animal is an addictive brain teaser where players sort colorful balls into matching tubes to solve challenging puzzles. With over 500 increasingly difficult levels, this cute puzzle game will keep you entertained for hours as you strategize the perfect moves to complete each level. The game features adorable animal characters that add charm to your puzzle-solving adventure, making the experience even more delightful. Perfect for puzzle lovers of all ages, Balls Animal combines simple mechanics with strategic thinking, making it easy to learn but satisfyingly challenging to master.
games.howToPlayText: Click on the bottle from which you want to take the ball, then click on the one where you want to place it.

games.description: Celebrate the Easter season with style! Join adorable girls in a fun-filled egg hunt and dress-up adventure. Find hidden eggs, style cute spring outfits, and top off the look with playful accessories like bunny ears. Dive into the festive spirit with Easter Rabbit Style!
games.howToPlayText: Search for hidden Easter eggs, then dress up the girls in festive outfits with fun accessories like bunny ears to complete their perfect holiday look!

games.title: Furry Kung Fu
games.description:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from.
games.howToPlayText:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from
–ö–∞–∫ –∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å
Control on the PC: by arrow buttons, on the smartphone - by swipes and taps on the screen.

Swipe: left/right arrow, tap on the screen to the left/right of the player.
Combo: repeatedly pressing the button in the direction where you want to apply a combo / multiple tap to the left or right of the player.
Sit down: down arrow / swipe down.
Jump: arrow up / swipe up.
Double jump (if available for a specific skin): double arrow up / two swipe up

Uppercut - squat and jump, arrow down and up / swipe down and up;
Attack from above - press the down arrow / swipe down while jumping.

The enemies drop weapons and lives. You can pick them up by tapping/tapping in their direction.

The enemy on the ball and comet can be shot down. The rat in the window can be turned off briefly by throwing a weapon at it.
Levels in the Survival game mode are unlocked as you progress through the main Campaign.

games.title: Eco Block Puzzle
games.description: Discover the intriguing realm of Eco Block Puzzle, where strategy and environmental healing converge. Solve complex puzzles to cleanse the planet and earn eco coins, introducing new life to the restored valley. Enjoy this unique blend of traditional puzzles and eco-friendly play on your device. Join the journey of creativity and restoration!
games.howToPlayText: It's a classic block puzzle game with additional meta. Players should clean the environment after an ecological catastrophe. Expand cleaned land and purchase animals and lifeforms.

games.title: Candy for capybara
games.description:
Capybara Wants a Candy!
Match identical marmalades to create bigger candies and earn coins.
Use the crane to grab delicious treats for your capybara!

Game Features:
36 levels with increasing difficulty ‚Äì from simple puzzles to challenging candy combinations.

Endless high-score mode ‚Äì compete with friends for the best candy-matching skills.

Jelly physics ‚Äì watch candies bounce, stick, and deform as they collide.

Adorable pet ‚Äì the capybara reacts to your success (happy when fed, sad when you miss).
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play:
Marmalade Candy Control:
üì± Mobile:

Touch & drag to move candies ‚Äì release to drop them.
üñ•Ô∏è Desktop:

Mouse: Click & drag, release to throw.

Keyboard: Arrow keys (‚Üê ‚Üí ‚Üë ‚Üì) + Space to drop.

Crane Control:
üì± Mobile:

Slide your finger to move the crane ‚Äì release to grab candy.
üñ•Ô∏è Desktop:

Mouse: Move cursor + click to grab.

Keyboard: Arrow keys (‚Üê ‚Üí) + Space to capture.

games.howToPlayText:

Think it's going to be a piece of cake? Oh, meow! Let's see if you've got what it takes!

Just tap a key, click with the mouse, tap the screen, or use your gamepad ‚Äî the kitty will know what to do!  
If you want to play together on the same computer: 
Player 1 selects a button
While Player 2 chooses a different one.

games.title: Primal Druid - Kingdom of Animals
games.description:
As a Primal Druid, your mission is to capture, train, and command an army of creatures ‚Äî from fierce battle cats and hybrid monsters to legendary mythical dragons. Strengthen your squad, complete thrilling quests, and survive in a dangerous open world filled with challenges.
 
Gameplay Highlights: 
‚Ä¢ Tame Creatures: Battle wild animals and beasts to turn them into loyal minions. Summon powerful allies like an alpha wolf or build an unstoppable army of pocket-sized critters.
‚Ä¢ Level Up Your Squad: Collect rare materials and craft powerful artifacts to upgrade your creatures‚Äô abilities and dominate the battlefield.
‚Ä¢ Explore & Survive: Forage for resources, face aquatic monsters, and uncover hidden secrets in the untamed wilderness.
‚Ä¢ Quests & Challenges: Complete exciting missions, unlock rewards, and test your skills against the dangers of the wild.
games.howToPlayText:
Controls: 
PC: 
‚Ä¢ Movement: Use W, A, S, D keys to move your character.

Mobile: 
‚Ä¢ Movement: Tap and drag on the screen to move your character.

games.title: Find The Dog
games.description: Get ready for some lighthearted fun! Explore whimsical black-and-white scenes filled with charming details and see how many cleverly hidden pups you can find. Each dog is playfully tucked away in different settings ‚Äî from cozy parks to bustling streets ‚Äî just waiting to be spotted. There's no rush, just relax and enjoy the search!
games.howToPlayText:
Get ready for some lighthearted fun! Explore whimsical black-and-white scenes filled with charming details and see how many cleverly hidden pups you can find. Each dog is playfully tucked away in different settings ‚Äî from cozy parks to bustling streets ‚Äî just waiting to be spotted. There's no rush, just relax and enjoy the search!

Controls:
üñ± Mouse: Move your cursor to explore the image.
üñ± Left Click: Click on a dog to find it.
üîç Scroll Wheel: Zoom in and out to get a closer look.
üñ± Hold Left Click + Drag: Pan around the image.
üí° Hint Button (bottom left): Tap it to reveal the location of a hidden dog when you're stuck.

Have fun, and see if you can find them all!

games.title: Animal Basketball
games.description:
Basketball games: The Power of Moe! Ultra-healing hand-painted physical shooting party

[Moe Animal Troupe Gathering] 
Manipulation will be serious kittens, cute chicks, naughty crocodiles! The cute characters come with their own exclusive shooting action, each action can trigger the screen heartbeat warning! 

[Visual Feast Blitz sports games]
‚óè Hoop game  with 100+ kinds of magical basketballs and special effects: pizza ball, fishbowl ball, baseball, etc. 
‚óè 4 healing courts: beach by the sea, countryside at sunset, deep forest, and dangerous cliffs - every basket will play tricks!

[Triple Pleasure Mode] 
Arcade Rampage: 60-second adrenaline challenge! Combo effects are stacked, full-screen blow-up effects are cool!
Road to the Championship: Challenge how many throws without missing it.
Achievement Mission: 200 missions! Unlock outrageous medals such as ‚ÄúBoard Wipe King‚Äù and ‚ÄúGod Pitcher‚Äù 

[Physics Ghostly Moments] 
Real Physics Engine x Moe's Magic Modification! The wall clock can also be used to shoot baskets!

Call your friends and have a healing and addictive fingertip hoop party!

Desktop Controls:
Mouse left button to drag and shoot.

Mobile Controls:
Touch and move on screen  to drag and shoot.

games.title: Farmers vs. Aliens
games.description: Lead the animals to their enclosures, identified by green arrows and matching images. Keep them inside the green zone to prevent alien abductions! As the game progresses, it slows down at a certain point. If you don't gather the animals in time, aliens will arrive to take them. Leaving the green zone‚Äîwhether it's you or the animals‚Äîwill trigger a UFO to appear and abduct them. If aliens take more than two animals or capture you, it's game over. Stay fast and remain in the green zone to survive!
games.howToPlayText:
PC: Use the mouse to control the character. Clicking the left mouse button will make the player follow the cursor.
Mobile: Drag the on-screen joystick in the direction you want the character to move.
Gamepad: Move the left stick to make the character run in the direction of the tilt.

games.title: Animal Merge
games.description:
Objective: Merge animal bubbles to create upgraded animals and ultimately achieve the final objective by collecting fully developed animals.
Gameplay Instructions:
Launching the Animal Bubbles:
Tap on an animal bubble to select it.
Drag the bubble backward to aim.
Release to launch the bubble in the opposite direction.
Merging Animal Bubbles:
When two identical animal bubbles collide, they merge to create an upgraded version.
Continue merging bubbles of the same type to progress.
Achieving the Objective:
Merge two basic-level animal bubbles to form an intermediate-level animal.
Merge intermediate-level animal bubbles to create the final full-fledged animal.
Once the final animal is created, it is automatically collected as part of the level objective.
Winning the Level:
The level is completed when you have successfully created and collected the required number of final animals.

games.title: Fishing Frenzy
games.description: In this exciting fishing game, your main goal is to catch as many fish as possible within a limited amount of time. You‚Äôll need to stay quick and attentive, because every second counts. Along the way, you can collect special bonuses that will help you during the challenge ‚Äî these include extra bait to keep catching more fish, powerful bombs to catch multiple fish at once, and even additional time to extend your fishing session. The better you plan your moves and use the bonuses, the higher your score will be. It‚Äôs a fun mix of speed, strategy, and fishing skills!
games.howToPlayText: Control on mobile devices is carried out using buttons on the screen, as well as on computers using arrow and space

games.title: Super Frog Adventure
games.description: "Super Frog Adventure" is a great platformer that takes you into the world of classic Super Mario style games. The game features 8 incredible and challenging levels, each offering unique obstacles and challenges. Control the super frog, overcome obstacles, fight enemies and collect coins on your way to the finish line. Dynamic gameplay and vivid graphics will make your journey exciting and memorable. This game is designed for both beginners and experienced players, thanks to different difficulty levels and interesting gameplay mechanics. If you love classic platformers and are ready for a new adventure, "Super Frog Adventure" is waiting for you! Discover the amazing world of Super Frog and dive into an exciting platforming adventure!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop: Left/Right or A/D keyboard keys to move the character. Up arrow or W keyboard key to make the character jump.

Mobile: Use touch screen buttons.

Press jump button in the air to perform a double jump.

Collect all the fruits to pass the level!

games.title: Farm Business Saga
games.description:
Farm Business Saga is a captivating farming simulation game where players build and manage their dream farm. Perfect for nature lovers and strategy enthusiasts, this game lets you cultivate crops, raise livestock, produce goods, and expand your agricultural empire.
What makes Farm Business Saga unique?
‚úÖ Addictive gameplay ‚Äì Manage resources, trade, and grow into a farming tycoon.
‚úÖ Stunning graphics & intuitive controls ‚Äì A visually pleasing experience for all ages.
‚úÖ Endless customization ‚Äì Design your farm, village, and factory your way!
Whether you're a casual player or a strategic mastermind, Farm Business Saga offers a relaxing yet challenging farming adventure!
games.howToPlayText:
Objective: Build a thriving farm business by growing crops, raising animals, producing goods, and selling them for profit. Expand your farm, unlock new opportunities, and become a farming mogul!
Key Gameplay Mechanics:
üå± Plant & Harvest Crops ‚Äì Choose your favorite crops, plant them, and sell for profit.
üêÑ Raise Livestock ‚Äì Manage cows, chickens, and more to produce milk, eggs, and other goods.
üè≠ Produce & Sell ‚Äì Process raw materials into high-value products in your factory.
üí∞ Expand Your Farm ‚Äì Unlock new lands, decorations, and upgrades to grow your empire.
Controls:
üñ±Ô∏è Tap & Drag ‚Äì Interact with crops, animals, and buildings.
üìä Menu Navigation ‚Äì Use on-screen buttons to manage inventory, sales, and upgrades.
‚öôÔ∏è Strategy Planning ‚Äì Balance resources to maximize profits and efficiency.
Win by becoming the most successful farm entrepreneur‚Äîexpand, innovate, and dominate the market!

games.title: Mouse Survivor
games.description: Get ready for the thrilling journey of Mouse Survivor! In this dynamic 2D game, you'll dodge dangerous snakes and tackle explosive obstacles while gathering cheese to explore new areas. Stay agile and quick to thrive in this constantly changing environment, available on both mobile and desktop!
games.howToPlayText:
How to play Mouse Survivor?

Keyboard Controls

W  / Arrow Up / Spacebar: Jump
A / Arrow Left:  Left
D / Arrow Right:  Right

For Mobile:Scroll             

üê≠ Run, Jump, and Explore Infinitely Divided Worlds with the Brave Mouse!üßÄ

Embark on an epic journey with our fearless mouse hero in this exciting 2D endless running game! 

üèÉ Endless Running Adventure:
Guide your mouse through a dynamic world full of ever-changing tiles. Watch out for those with lower alpha; One touch can be dangerous! Dodge, jump and slide your way through endless challenges.


üêç Encounter Sneaky Snakes:
Watch out for crawling snakes! Snakes will try to hinder your progress. Swipe right, left or up to perform daring moves and escape their cunning clutches. Can you outsmart the serpentine enemies?


üßÄ Cheese Collection and Upgrades:
Munch on delicious cheeses scattered along the way to increase your cheese count. Acquire new tile types by spending your hard-earned cheeses. Customize your running experience with a variety of tiles, each with its own unique features and challenges!
Good Luck...

games.title: Click Kitty Idle
games.description:
Click Kitty Idle‚Äì Fast-Paced Cat Clicker Challenge!
Click Kitty Idle is a fun and competitive idle clicker game where speed, timing, and strategy matter! Tap to feed your kitty, level up, and dominate the leaderboard in this addictively cute cat-clicking game!                                             
Why You‚Äôll Love It:
If you enjoy fast-paced clicker games with a twist, It‚Äôs not just about clicking‚Äîit's about clicking smart and fast.
Play now and prove you‚Äôve got the fastest¬†paws¬†in¬†town!

‚Ä¢Cute & competitive gameplay with pressure-based challenges!
‚Ä¢Buy fun food like tuna, milk, cheese & more!
‚Ä¢Unlock cute cat characters like Miss Pawlina and Captain Purrbeard!
‚Ä¢Boosters: Auto Click, Time Extension, and Massive Click Power!
‚Ä¢Compete for high scores and unlock achievements!
games.howToPlayText:
Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI

How to Play:
‚Ä¢You have 32 seconds to earn coins by clicking.
‚Ä¢Use coins to buy cat food before time runs out!
‚Ä¢Each time you buy food, the price increases (ex: 100 ‚Üí 860 ‚Üí more!)
‚Ä¢Upgrade your Click Value to +1, +2... and increase your speed!

games.title: Cartoon cat: naughty kitten
games.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Cartoon Cat: Mischievous Kitten - an action-stealth game where you are a nimble kitten collecting delicious sausages and escaping from many dangers!

What awaits you:

Roaring robot vacuum cleaners: avoid noisy machines, hide in secluded corners.

Hooligan pranks: mess around in people's apartments - throw objects, distract the residents, but don't get caught!

Hide and seek: use furniture, boxes and shadows to hide from your enemies.

Chases and traps: escape from vicious dogs and rush through the streets, beware of cars.

Your goal:

Collect as many sausages as possible.

Maneuver between enemies and traps.

Save all lives and find the exit from each level.

Ready to test yourself in the most fun (but dangerous!) kitty adventure of the season? Then go ahead - Cartoon Cat is waiting for you!
games.howToPlayText:
On the phone, the cat is controlled with a joystick for movement and a button for hitting.

On a computer, the control looks like this:

Forward: W key or up arrow.
Back: S key or down arrow.
Left: A key or left arrow.
Right: the D key or the right arrow.
You can use the left or right mouse button to perform a kick.

games.title: DreamBlox
games.description: Join a multiplayer game where you can earn coins, buy accessories and cute pets, and train them in various tricks at a special school.
games.howToPlayText:
Collect coins and explore the world! Use your earned coins to purchase pets and various accessories in the shops.
Take your pets to a special school to teach them different tricks.
Explore all locations and discover new entertainment opportunities.
